item.content:

Work Experience

\vspace{-1em}
Rootstock (Nov 2022–Present) Core Developer in the team responsible for the implementation of the Rootstock node.
Focused on feature development, maintaining EVM compatibility, bug fixing and code review for master branch merges.

Technologies used: Java, Gradle, TypeScript, Go (extensive use of Geth codebase), Hardhat, Foundry, RocksDB. |

| BBVA (Aug 2021–Nov 2022) | Backend Developer for credit card payment processing APIs and digital wallet (MODO) integration. Key responsibilities included API development for bank-wallet integration ensuring high security standards, and developing features for credit and debit card transactions including subscriptions, discounts, and recurring payments. |

| Freelance (2021–Present) | Blockchain Consultant providing advice and development services on blockchain tools, integrations, security, and privacy for small businesses and individuals. |

| FIUBA (2019–2022) | Teaching Assistant for “Algorithms and Data structures” in Electronic Engineering. |

| Freelance (2019–2022) | Web Developer for small businesses and individuals, specializing in custom solutions. |

Rootstock Labs, Core Blockchain Developer (nov 2022 – now)

As a core team member at Rootstock, my role involves developing features, ensuring Ethereum compatibility, optimizing blockchain performance, fixing bugs, and overseeing code integration into the main client implementation. Interesting projects I’ve worked on:

  • Snapshot Sync: Implemented a new synchronization mode in collaboration with the research team. This involved using different networking structures, parallel execution, and validation.
  • Armadillo: Focused on securing Rootstock’s merge-mining process, involving calls to Bitcoin nodes to check block data and ensure RSK blocks are tagged to the Bitcoin chain.

BBVA Bank, Backend Developer (aug 2021 – nov 2022)

Key responsibilities:

  • Digital Wallet Integration: Developed APIs for BBVA’s integration with a native payment wallet, emphasizing robust security features.
  • Credit Card Payment APIs: Created APIs for various credit and debit card functionalities, including subscriptions, discounts, and recurring payments, for both internal bank services and home banking applications.

Freelance Blockchain Consultant (2021 – present)

Provide consultancy and project execution for small businesses and individuals in integrating blockchain technology into their operations.

Education

FIUBA, Computer Engineering
